==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1  = Tutorial Radiant Sparks 1.png
|text1   = In the Radiant Sparks challenge, the less {{Color|help|time taken}} and the more {{Color|help|Challenge Coins}} collected, the higher your final score will become.
|image2  = Tutorial Radiant Sparks 2.png
|text2   = During the challenge, you can obtain the Technique "Sparkling Rush" by collecting Aegises of Sparks.
|image3  = Tutorial Radiant Sparks 3.png
|text3   = By unleashing {{Color|help|Sparkling Rush}}, the character will {{Color|help|dash forward, collecting all Challenge Coins nearby}}.<br />Additionally, Sparkling Rush can pierce through the barriers of the Obstruction Fruits.
|image4  = Tutorial Radiant Sparks 4.png
|text4   = Approach {{Color|help|Firework Fruits}} to {{Color|help|rapidly leap}} into the air using the fireworks' power. Your Wind Glider will automatically deploy upon reaching the highest point.
}}
